string.name: do_registration
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Register Now.

string.name: do_login
string.u: Already have an account? Sign in

resources.string: Both username and password are required
When people you invite join,\neveryone earns money.
Friends refer friends. Everyone earns money.\nLet\'s share the wealth all over the world.
I will send a link to your email address bellow.
Be sure to check spam or junkmail.
Please enter a valid phone number
You must provide a value for this field
Like an elephant, we never forget. Human effort is Shakti. One would always remember and reward honest effort. Please do provide and info about the person who referred you to Shakti.
I don\'t remember who referred me
You\'ve successfuly registered your referral.\nWith your good deed, your friend is little closer to unlocking their Bonus Bounty.

string.name: refconfirm_story2
string.b: Finish your registration now to claim your Bonus Bounty.

resources.string: Cool, take me to my wallet!
Special limited offer for early adopters!
Sign up now! Show Proof-of-Effort (POE), and receive an impressive bounty, valued at $$%1$.2d USD!

Earn an addition income with Shakti!

However, we need to make sure that there is no error and you provide us with a correct email address. Please, open your email, find a message from us, and click confirmation link.

After your email is confirmed you may return and log in using the email and the password you just entered.\n\nComplete registration and become a miner!
Get an extra SXE 1,000 bonus bounty\n- that is $5,000 USD
Get an extra SXE 10,000 bonus bounty\n- that is $50,000 USD
Get an extra SXE 10,000 bonus bounty\n- that is $50,000 USD
Get an extra SXE 10,000 bonus bounty\n- that is $50,000 USD
Get an extra SXE 10,000 bonus bounty\n- that is $50,000 USD
For a one time payment of

M101 Features

•Individual Mining Licese

•Mine SXE coins from home or wherever you work from.

•Priority upgrade option to Power Mining License.

T100 Features

•Exclusive limited territory access.

•Be among the first 20.000 Power Miners.

•Be the first to on-board merchants.

•Earn thousands of USD equivalent in SXE.

T200 Features

•All features from M101 and T100 License.

•Be among the first 50.000 Power Miners.

•Dedicated Support.

•Earn thousands of USD equivalent in SXE.

T300 Features

•Exclusive limited territory access.

•Be among the first 50.000 Power Miners.

•Be the first to on-board merchants.

•Earn thousands of USD equivalent in SXE.

T400 Features

•Be among the first 60.000 Power Miners.

•Be the first one to choose your data center anywhere in the world.

•Earn thousands of USD equivalent in SXE.
